plot: A soldier returns from war and attempts to redeem an act from the battle zone. A story told in flashbacks, between Afghanistan and the U.S - until the two become one.
title: Hearts and Minds
plot_es: A soldier returns from war and attempts to redeem an act from the battle zone. A story told in flashbacks, between Afghanistan and the U.S - until the two become one.
plot_en: A soldier returns from war and attempts to redeem an act from the battle zone. A story told in flashbacks, between Afghanistan and the U.S - until the two become one.
